title: T206 Red Cobb SGC A $2,800. and Cy Young SGC 10 $1,200.00 Better Scans Added
author: philliesfan

posts.post_title: T206 Red Cobb SGC A $2,800. and Cy Young SGC 10 $1,200.00 Better Scans Added
posts.post_content:
I just purchased a small collection of T206's.  I am listening to offers for the following 2 cards.  Please pm me with offers.
Thanks,
Bob

# 1 - T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait - SGC A - Piedmont Series 350-460 Factory 25 2nd Dist. VA. $2,800.00 Net to me.

# 2 - T206 Cy Young Hand Shows - SGC 10 - Piedmont Series 150 Factory 25 2nd Dist. VA.  $1,200.00 Net to me.

***SALE*** - Both for $3,800.00.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=487951&d=1637096964[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=487952&d=1637096983[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=487953&d=1637097000[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=487955&d=1637097019[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=487956&d=1637097027[/IMG]
Is the Cobb recolored or bottom trimmed!

I used a good magnifier and could not find any trace of recoloring. 
Th bottom has scuffed edges sort of like an OPC cut card but I cannot tell if has been trimmed.
Thanks,
Bob

posts.post_title: Scanner doesn't work for graded cards
posts.post_content:
Hey Bob,
I ran into the same problem when I tried to scan in my graded cards.  They'll always turn out blurry.  The best option I found was just to use my camera phone and stand the cards up so you don't get a big glare from overhead lights.

Hey thanks.  I will try that!
Bob
